name: Project Orpheus
description:
A new device is being developed called Project Orpheus, a machine that will let people free their spirit from their bodies and enter the Netherworld. The lead researcher, Haeg, believes it will be mankind's ultimate achievement. Others see it as a weapon that could destroy humanity as we know it. Play as Alex as he tries to steal the device from the research facility and save the love of his life.

Programmer: Ralph Y. Wong

If you want to keep up on the latest games by me, consider joining my discord server. https://discord.gg/tDQbm5xAq9
